gadget.name: ObserverModeRecButton
gadget.mouseovertext: Click to Toggle Observer Mode. Only use this mode while watching recorded games.

gadget.name: PlayerStatusButton
gadget.mouseovertext: $$21433$$Set diplomacy toward other players in the game.

gadget.name: ChatButton
gadget.mouseovertext: $$21431$$Chat to other players in the game.

gadget.name: MenuButton
gadget.mouseovertext: $$18410$$Click on this icon to see the in-game menu.

gadget.name: GodPowersToggleButton
gadget.mouseovertext: Click to Toggle God Powers and Age text (it doesn't affect Titan Gate). The number displayed on the UI is the number of finished Manors you currently posses.

gadget.name: GatherRateToggleButton
gadget.mouseovertext: Click to Toggle Gather Rates (shows the gather rates per unit). The number displayed on the UI is the number of finished Houses you currently posses.

gadget.name: GodPowersToggleButton
gadget.mouseovertext: Click to Toggle God Powers and Age text (it doesn't affect Titan Gate).

gadget.name: GatherRateToggleButton
gadget.mouseovertext: Click to Toggle Gather Rates (shows the gather rates per unit).

gadget.name: RecIdleVillagers
gadget.mouseovertext: Number of idle Villagers of the currently selected player.

gadget.name: RecIdleFishingShips
gadget.mouseovertext: Number of idle Fishing Ships of the currently selected player.

gadget.name: RecIdleCaravans
gadget.mouseovertext: Number of idle Caravans of the currently selected player.

gadget.name: armyBanner
gadget.mouseovertext: $$18409$$Form an Army by selecting units and right clicking on an empty banner.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-RepeatQueue-button
gadget.mouseovertext: $$23753$$Click this button to repeat current build queue.

gadget.name: CameraRotateButton
gadget.mouseovertext: Camera Rotate, Zoom and Pitch Normal.

gadget.name: flareButton
gadget.mouseovertext: $$18424$$Click this button, and then click in the world to send a flare to all other players.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-normalAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: Hack Attack: Damage done by most hand-to-hand weapons, such as swords and axes. Pierce Attack: Damage done by most ranged weapons, such as bows and slings. Crush Attack: Damage done by siege weapons, and some myth units.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-pierceAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: Hack Attack: Damage done by most hand-to-hand weapons, such as swords and axes. Pierce Attack: Damage done by most ranged weapons, such as bows and slings. Crush Attack: Damage done by siege weapons, and some myth units.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-crushAttack
gadget.mouseovertext: Hack Attack: Damage done by most hand-to-hand weapons, such as swords and axes. Pierce Attack: Damage done by most ranged weapons, such as bows and slings. Crush Attack: Damage done by siege weapons, and some myth units.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-normalArmor
gadget.mouseovertext: Hack Armor: The percentage of damage absorbed from hack attacks, such as swords. Pierce Armor: The percentage of damage absorbed from pierce attacks, such as arrows. Crush Armor: The percentage of damage absorbed from crush attacks, such as siege and some myth units.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-pierceArmor
gadget.mouseovertext: Train Time/Speed/Bounty/LOS. Train Time -- Current Unit Train Time. Speed -- Current Unit Speed. Bounty -- Current Unit Favor Worth if killed by Norse. LOS -- Current Unit Line Of sight.

gadget.name: unitStatPanel-stat-Range
gadget.mouseovertext: Min Range/Max Range: The distance at which an attack has a chance to strike its target.

gadget.name: EkantaMarketBuy
gadget.mouseovertext: Click this button to toggle blackmap in single player only.

gadget.name: EkantaMarketSell
gadget.mouseovertext: Click this button to toggle fog of war in single player only.

gadget.name: CurrentResourcesAllIcon
gadget.mouseovertext: Show current resources and population for every player.

gadget.name: TechnologiesResearchingIcon
gadget.mouseovertext: Show current technologies being researched by every player.

gadget.name: 1and2button
gadget.mouseovertext: Observer command buttons: add players 1 and 2 and the technologies button.
gadget.command: gadgetUnReal("1and2button") gadgetReal("3and4button") gadgetReal("Player1Info") gadgetReal("Player2Info") GadgetReal ("TechnologiesResearching") GadgetReal ("CurrentResourcesAll")

gadget.name: 3and4button
gadget.mouseovertext: Observer command buttons: add players 3 and 4.

gadget.name: 5and6button
gadget.mouseovertext: Observer command buttons: add players 5 and 6.

gadget.name: 7and8button
gadget.mouseovertext: Observer command buttons: add players 7 and 8.

gadget.name: resetbutton
gadget.command: GadgetUnreal ("TechnologiesResearching") GadgetUnreal ("CurrentResourcesAll") gadgetUnReal("resetbutton") gadgetReal("1and2button") gadgetUnReal("Player1Info") gadgetUnReal("Player2Info") gadgetUnReal("Player3Info") gadgetUnReal("Player4Info") gadgetUnReal("Player5Info") gadgetUnReal("Player6Info") gadgetUnReal("Player7Info") gadgetUnReal("Player8Info")

gadget.name: EkantaPitchZoomGameToggle
gadget.mouseovertext: Camera Settings. Only works in Single Player.

gadget.name: EkantaresetfakeSpecularSunColor
gadget.mouseovertext: ResetfakeSpecularSunColor (Mostly affects water by making the sun reflect in it)

gadget.name: EkantaPitch
gadget.mouseovertext: Pitch -90 to 90 (Numbers below Zero uses negative Zoom to function, since you have to be under to look up or all you see is the sky. Reset Zoom if you need to go back to a positive Pitch.)

gadget.name: EkantaNormalZoom
gadget.mouseovertext: Rotate + Zoom Normal (normal Zoom range is 50-100)

gadget.name: EkantaZoom
gadget.mouseovertext: Zoom 100 - 1000. + is like normal, but you can zoom-in more.

gadget.gadget: This god is cool. Pick it.
This god is cool. Pick it.

gadget.gadget: $$18461$$Warning: This computer program is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution of this program, or any portion of it, may result in severe civil and criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law.
